replies.body: Actually I've been watching Project Runway and it's very much like Skins/Character concept XD

MFW a Rioter responds to my post:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/jWzdlN2I-wk/hqdefault.jpg
Ahh astolfo. I see you are a man of culture.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jWzdlN2I-wk

For your viewing pleasure
But thats dragrace.
RuPaul's is pretty popular too, but when it comes to feedback culture Tim Gunn wrote the book.

Art team talking to the balance team. 

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/231/284/de9.gif
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Z7Zwpt5lQms/maxresdefault.jpg

Ok balance team, can you handle that? 

https://media.giphy.com/media/lO6Alfgfei6go/source.gif

"Don't worry, Ornn is weak and needs a buff"
 
*turns head to archimedes*

"No zhey don't"
https://78.media.tumblr.com/4e28dbadd4f28644aa18a51944fa34bc/tumblr_o861ptcc6u1qlatf4o5_500.gif
STEEEE!!

> Betty White Victorious Graves

> Box Office Gold Gangplank

> Wet on Wet Fizz
balance team: {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
I need the name of that dude with the fan
Frank Fabulosi
I can't find it, are you sure it is his name?
Now I want Filthy Frank to host a fashion show. Ravioli kilts. Pink skinsuits. Shotgun life hacks. I'd buy youtube red for that.
What about the lore team?
https://image.ibb.co/gWtLOR/Boardroom_Meeting_Suggestion.jpg

Balance team just want to watch the world burn.  
Yall saying they're noobs, they can't understand their own game, yada yada.  
They're doing it on purpose because they delight in the suffering of millions.

This is proven by the rework of Evelynn.

The balance team played a part and didn't announce it
Lol at the balance team.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KB-yd4K-jWE
I think the "skin dept." failed. JS.

Internal Play tester experience in the wrong medium:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7uWW--w4SRs

######*(It's just a joke, don't hurt me!)*
Team that comes up with new things like loot boxes and related things: Reduce BE gains and OE gains and release more RP only ways of getting them faster.

It's been like this for years.

:(
